Object.Field:
COMPONENT NAME: LKM File to Teradata (TTU) COMPONENT VERSION: 10.1.3.3 AUTHOR: Oracle COMPATIBILITY: ODI 10.1.3.5.0 and above
DESCRIPTION Loading from a flat File to a Teradata staging area using either FASTLOAD, MULTILOAD, TPUMP or TPT. This KM executes the following steps: 1. Generates the loading script (fastload, multiload, tpump or tpt) 2. Loads the data in the C$ temporary table in the staging area by using the specified utility (with the TERADATA UTILITY option) 3. Removes the temporary data files created (if specified with the DEL_TEMP_FILES option) Additional information can be found in the Teradata Utilities Documentation. If file is to be loaded directly into target table, the use of IKM File to Teradata is recommanded. TTU scripts and logs are stored in the work directory of the source file.
BASIC CONFIGURATION - Make sure that the Data Server checkbox is checked in your Topology for the Teradata Technology and specify your Teradata server host in the Server field of your Data Server definition. To do that: 1. Edit the "Teradata" Technology definition in the Topology 2. Check the Naming Rules -> Using "Data Server" checkbox 3. Used Term : "Server" 4. Apply your changes 5. Edit your Teradata Dataserver definiton 6. In the Server field, enter the IP name of your Teradata Server (without "COPn") - Make sure that the host running the ODI Agent has the appropriate Teradata utilities installed (fastload ,multiload, tpump, tpt) - Make sure that utility command scripts are stored in a secured directory, as they may contain passwords for the Teradata database. They can be deleted by the KM at the end of the job if the DEL_TEMP_FILES option is set to Yes. - The REPORT_NB_ROWS option generates a warning in the ODI Log. The error message of the task contains the report of the number of rows processed.
OPTIONS (Refer to Option descriptions for more information on each option) - REPORT_NB_ROWS: List summary of load report in ODI log? - SESSIONS: Min and/or max number of Teradata load sessions to use - DEL_TEMP_FILES: Remove temp files after load? - DROP_WORK_TABLE: Drop ODI work tables after load? - DROP_TTU_TABLES: Drop Teradata utility tables before load? - TERADATA_UTILITY: Which Teradata load utility to use? - MAX_ALLOWED_ERRORS: specify Teradata ERRLIMIT - COLLECT_STATS: Collect statistics on ODI work table? - VALIDATE: Validate KM options? - ODI_DDL: Specify, what DDL to be generated? - PRIMARY_INDEX: Primary index for work table
LIMITATIONS - Mappings on source are not supported. See IKM File to Teradata for transformations on source. - Physical length of all source columns need to be set. - Fixed length files must not have any gaps between two columns. The end of col (n-1) needs to be directly followed by the beginning of col (n). - Only source data types String (includes Timestamps), Numeric and Date supported - Date and Timestamp formats need to be specified on source columns in ODI COL_FORMAT field. Please refer to Java Help for details on format syntax. E.g. "dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm:ss" for Timestamp. - Following date and timestamp format translations supported: Java Teradata Note "y" "Y" Year, supported: yyyy;yy => 1996;96 "M" "M" Month, supported: MMMM;MMM;MM => July;Jul;07 "DDD" "DDD" Day in year "dd" "DD" Day in month "a" "T" Am/pm marker "H" "H" Hour in day (0-23) "K" "H" Hour in day (0-11) "mm" "MI" Minute in hour "ss" "SS2 Second in minute "SSS" "S(F)" Millisecond in second "z" "Z" Timezone "Z" "Z" Timezone " " "B" Blank - Following numeric format translations supported: Java Teradata Note "0" "9" Digit "#" "Z" Digit, zero shows as absent "." "D" Decimal separator "-" "-" Minus sign "," "G" Grouping separator "E" "E" Separates mantissa & exponent in scientific notation " " "B" Blank - Some formats can only be read, if Teradata SDF (Specification for Data Formatting) are appropriately set - For more details on Teradata Data Types and their formats please see Teradata "SQL Reference: Data Types and Literals" - Following DataStore information is ignored: heading (not suported by neither FastLoad,MLoad,TPump nor TPT), record separator (automatically chosen by TTU), text delimiter (not supported by TTU), decimal separator (automatically chosen by TTU/SDF) - No source filters supported - When used with IKM with COMMIT=NO, last drop table statement issues warning, as table is still locked by pending transaction.
Report the number of rows processed as an exception to the ODI Log (a task reporting the number of rows processed should appear as a warning in the log).

The following example specifies four FastLoad sessions: SESSION 4
The following example specifies ten FastLoad sessions with a minimum of five: SESSIONS 10 5
Uncheck this option if you want to keep the temporary fastload script after integration
Uncheck thit option if you want to keep the work table after integration

This option is intended for development use only. Do NOT use in production!
If activated, drops all Teradata utility tables like - acquisition error table - application error table - log table - work table

Choose the teradata utility to load data choose: TPUMP to use tpump utility MLOAD to use multiload utility FASTLOAD to use fastload utility TPT-LOAD to use parallel transporter (load operator) TPT-SQL-INSERT to use parallel transporter (sql insert operator)
For details and appropriate choice of utility/ load operator, see Teradata documentation: TPUMP Teradata Parallel Data Pump Reference MLOAD Teradata MultiLoad Reference FASTLOAD Teradata FastLoad Reference TPT-LOAD Teradata Parallel Transporter Reference Teradata Parallel Transporter User Guide TPT-SQL-INSERT Teradata Parallel Transporter Reference Teradata Parallel Transporter User Guide

Maximum number of tolerated errors. This corresponds to - ERRLIMIT command in FastLoad, MultiLoad and TPump - ErrorLimit attribute in TPT Load operator Note: TPT SQL Insert operator does not support any error limit. This option is ignored for TPT-SQL-INSERT.
Collect stats on PI of load table?
Collect statistics on primary index of load table?
Validate use of KM and options

This option generates an extra validation step during development. Validations performed are: - Validation of TERADATA_UTILITY option - Validation of ODI_DDL option - Are all mappings executed on Staging? - Is physical length information set for all source columns?
This option should be turned off for all production use in particular for high-frequency execution. There is not added value in production, only processing overhead.

The generation of DDL commands can be controlled by setting ODI_DDL: DROP_CREATE Drop and recreate all ODI temp tables at every execution CREATE_DELETE_ALL Create all temp tables (ignore warnings) and use DELETE ALL DELETE_ALL Only submit DELETE ALL for all temp tables NONE Do not submit any DDL

Specify primary index for work table. Teradata uses the PI to spread data accross AMPs. Valid options are [PK] Specify primary key of work table. ODI will use ROWID as primary index column. [NOPI] Do not specify primary index for work table (Teradata 13.0 & above only).

import os logname = r"<%=odiRef.getSrcTablesList("", "[WORK_SCHEMA]/[TABLE_NAME]_", "", "")+odiRef.getInfo("SRC_SET_NAME")%>.log" scriptname = r"<%=odiRef.getSrcTablesList("", "[WORK_SCHEMA]/[TABLE_NAME]_", "", "")+odiRef.getInfo("SRC_SET_NAME")%>.script"
utility = r"""<% if (odiRef.getOption( "TERADATA_UTILITY" ).equals( "FASTLOAD" )) { %>fastload < "%s" > "%s"<% } else if (odiRef.getOption( "TERADATA_UTILITY" ).equals( "MLOAD" )) { %>mload < "%s" > "%s"<% } else if (odiRef.getOption( "TERADATA_UTILITY" ).equals( "TPUMP" )) { %>tpump < "%s" > "%s"<% } else { %>tbuild -f "%s" > "%s"<%};%> """ loadcmd = utility % (scriptname, logname)
if os.system(loadcmd) <> 0 : raise "Load Error", "See %s for details" % logname

<% if (odiRef.getOption( "ODI_DDL" ).indexOf( "DROP" )>-1) { %>
locking table <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "COLL_NAME", "A")%> for exclusive nowait drop table <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "COLL_NAME", "A")%>
<%} else {%> -- Disabled by ODI_DDL option <%}%>

<% if (odiRef.getOption( "TERADATA_UTILITY" ).equals( "MLOAD" )) {%> drop table <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "COLL_NAME", "W").replaceAll("<.=","<?s=").replaceAll("..>",".replaceAll((char)92+\\u0022.\\u0022,\\u0022.WT_\\u0022); out.print(s.substring(0,s.indexOf(\\u0022.\\u0022)+1+java.lang.Math.min(s.length()-s.indexOf(\\u0022.\\u0022)-1,"+ odiRef.getInfo("DEST_MAX_TAB_NAME_LEN") +")));?>")%> <%} else {%> -- Only needed for Teradata MultiLoad <%};%>

<% if ( odiRef.getOption( "TERADATA_UTILITY" ).equals( "MLOAD" ) || odiRef.getOption( "TERADATA_UTILITY" ).equals( "TPUMP" )) {%> drop table <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "COLL_NAME", "W").replaceAll("<.=","<?s=").replaceAll("..>",".replaceAll((char)92+\\u0022.\\u0022,\\u0022.LOG_\\u0022); out.print(s.substring(0,s.indexOf(\\u0022.\\u0022)+1+java.lang.Math.min(s.length()-s.indexOf(\\u0022.\\u0022)-1,"+ odiRef.getInfo("DEST_MAX_TAB_NAME_LEN") +")));?>")%> <%} else {%> -- Only needed for Teradata MultiLoad and TPump <%};%>

<% if (odiRef.getOption( "ODI_DDL" ).indexOf( "DROP" )>-1) { %>
drop table <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "COLL_NAME", "A")%>
<%} else {%> -- Disabled by ODI_DDL option <%}%>
<% if (odiRef.getOption("TERADATA_UTILITY").equals("MLOAD")) {%> release mload <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "COLL_NAME", "A")%> <%} else {%> -- Only needed for MLOAD <%};%>

<% if (odiRef.getOption( "ODI_DDL" ).indexOf( "CREATE" )>-1) { %>

create multiset table <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "COLL_NAME", "A")%>,
	no fallback,
	no after journal,
	no before journal
(
	

<% /* No PI ? */
       if (odiRef.getOption("PRIMARY_INDEX").equals("[NOPI]")) 
          out.print(" C$_ROWID	INTEGER,  ");
       else
          out.print(" C$_ROWID	INTEGER  GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY,  ");
%>

<%=odiRef.getColList("", "\t[CX_COL_NAME]\t[DEST_WRI_DT] "+ odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL"),  ",\n", "","")%>
)

<% /* use key for PI ? */
      if (odiRef.getOption("PRIMARY_INDEX").equals("[PK]")) 
          out.print("primary index (C$_ROWID) ");
      else if (odiRef.getOption("PRIMARY_INDEX").equals("[NOPI]")) 
          out.print("no primary index ");
%>

<%} else {%>
-- Disabled by ODI_DDL option
<%}%>

<% if ( odiRef.getOption("COLLECT_STATS").equals("1") && odiRef.getOption("PRIMARY_INDEX").length() > 0 && !odiRef.getOption("PRIMARY_INDEX").equals("[NOPI]") ) { %> collect stats using sample on <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "COLL_NAME", "A")%> column (C$_ROWID) <% } else { %> -- No stats, as no PRIMARY_INDEX specified or COLLECT_STATS disabled. <%};%>

<% if (odiRef.getOption( "ODI_DDL" ).indexOf( "DELETE_ALL" )>-1) { %>
delete from <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "COLL_NAME", "A")%> all
<%} else {%> -- Disabled by ODI_DDL option <%}%>

<?

package com.oracle.odi.ext;

public class FormatTranslator {
	// Java Number Formatting information available at http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.4.2/docs/api/java/text/DecimalFormat.html
	// Java Date Formatting information available at http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.4.2/docs/api/java/text/SimpleDateFormat.html
	// Teradata Number Formatting information available in Teradata SQL Reference: Chapter "Output Format Phrases": FORMAT phrases and NUMERIC formats
	// Teradata Date Formatting information available in Teradata SQL Reference: Chapter "Output Format Phrases": FORMAT phrases and DateTime formats
	
	static String[][] transTableDate = {
	    {"y",		"Y"},	// Year, supported:  yyyy;yy => 1996;96
	    {"M",		"M"},	// Month, supported: MMMM;MMM;MM => July;Jul;07
	    {"DDD",		"DDD"},	// Day in year 
	    {"dd",		"DD"},	// Day in month
	    {"a",		"T"},	// Am/pm marker 
	    {"H",		"H"},	// Hour in day (0-23)
	    {"K",		"H"},	// Hour in day (0-11)
	    {"mm",		"MI"},	// Minute in hour 
	    {"ss",		"SS"},	// Second in minute 
	    {"SSS",		"S(F)"},// Millisecond in second 
	    {"z",		"Z"},	// Timezone
	    {"Z",		"Z"},	// Timezone
	    {" ",		"B"}	// Blank
	};
	
	static String[][] transTableNumber = {
		{"0",	"9"},	// Digit
		{"#",	"Z"}, 	// Digit, zero shows as absent
		{"\\.",	"D"},	// Decimal separator
		{"-",	"-"},	// Minus sign
		{",",	"G"},	// Grouping separator
		{"E",	"E"},	// Separates mantissa and exponent in scientific notation			    
	    {" ",	"B"}	// Blank
	};
	   

	public static String translate(String begin, String srcDT, String colFormat, String end) throws Exception {
		String format = "";
		
		if (colFormat.trim().length()==0) 
			/* we use Teradata's default format */
			format = "";
		else {
			// Is source column a date?
			if ( srcDT.toUpperCase().equals( "DATE") ) {
				format = colFormat;
				for (int i = 0; i < transTableDate.length; i++)
					format = format.replaceAll( transTableDate[i][0], transTableDate[i][1] );
			} else 
			// Is source column a numeric?
			if ( srcDT.toUpperCase().equals( "NUMERIC")) {
				format = colFormat;
				for (int i = 0; i < transTableNumber.length; i++)
					format = format.replaceAll( transTableNumber[i][0], transTableNumber[i][1] );
			} else 
			// Is source column anything else than a string?
			if ( !srcDT.toUpperCase().equals( "STRING" )) 
				throw new Exception("No format translation defined for data type "+srcDT+"!"); 
		};
		if ( format.length() > 0 )
			format = begin + format + end;
		return format;
	}

}

// for testing:
//out.print( FormatTranslator.translate("Numeric", "-#,###.##E -000" ));

?>OdiOutFile "-File=<%=odiRef.getSrcTablesList("", "[WORK_SCHEMA]/[TABLE_NAME]_"+odiRef.getInfo("SRC_SET_NAME"), "", "")%>.script"
<% if (odiRef.getOption("TERADATA_UTILITY").equals("FASTLOAD")) {

/********************************************************************************/ 
/* FastLoad Script 				*/ 
/********************************************************************************/ %>

SESSIONS <%=odiRef.getOption("SESSIONS")%>;
<% if ((new java.lang.Integer(odiRef.getOption("MAX_ALLOWED_ERRORS"))).longValue()>0) {%>ERRLIMIT <%=odiRef.getOption("MAX_ALLOWED_ERRORS")%>;<%}; %>
LOGON <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DSERV_NAME")%>/<%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_USER_NAME")%>,<%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_PASS")%>;

BEGIN LOADING <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "COLL_NAME", "W")%>
	ERRORFILES <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "COLL_NAME", "W").replaceAll("<.=","<?s=").replaceAll("..>",".replaceAll((char)92+\\u0022.\\u0022,\\u0022.ET_\\u0022); out.print(s.substring(0,s.indexOf(\\u0022.\\u0022)+1+java.lang.Math.min(s.length()-s.indexOf(\\u0022.\\u0022)-1,"+ odiRef.getInfo("DEST_MAX_TAB_NAME_LEN") +")));?>")%>, <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "COLL_NAME", "W").replaceAll("<.=","<?s=").replaceAll("..>",".replaceAll((char)92+\\u0022.\\u0022,\\u0022.UV_\\u0022); out.print(s.substring(0,s.indexOf(\\u0022.\\u0022)+1+java.lang.Math.min(s.length()-s.indexOf(\\u0022.\\u0022)-1,"+ odiRef.getInfo("DEST_MAX_TAB_NAME_LEN") +")));?>")%>;


<%if (odiRef.getSrcTablesList("", "[FILE_FORMAT]", "", "").equals("F")) {%>

SET RECORD TEXT;
DEFINE
<%=odiRef.getSrcColList("", "\t[COL_NAME]\t(char([BYTES]))", "\t[COL_NAME]\t(char([BYTES]))", ",\n", "")%>
<%} else {%>

SET RECORD VARTEXT "<%=odiRef.getSrcTablesList("", "[SFILE_SEP_FIELD]", "", "")%>";
DEFINE
<%=odiRef.getSrcColList("", "\t[COL_NAME]\t(varchar([BYTES]))", "\t[COL_NAME]\t(varchar([BYTES]))", ",\n", "")%>
<%}%>
FILE=<%=odiRef.getSrcTablesList("", "[SCHEMA]/[RES_NAME]", "", "")%>;

INSERT INTO <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "COLL_NAME", "W")%>
(
<%=odiRef.getColList("", "\t[CX_COL_NAME]", ",\n", "","")%>
)
VALUES (
<%=odiRef.getColList("", "\t:[COL_NAME]\t<?=FormatTranslator.translate(\u0022(FORMAT'\u0022, \u0022[SOURCE_DT]\u0022, \u0022[COL_FORMAT]\u0022, \u0022')\u0022)?>"
	, ",\n","","")%>
);

END LOADING;

LOGOFF;
<%}%>
<% if (odiRef.getOption("TERADATA_UTILITY").equals("MLOAD")) { 

/********************************************************************************/ 
/* MLoad Script 				*/ 
/********************************************************************************/ %>


.LOGTABLE <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "COLL_NAME", "W").replaceAll("<.=","<?s=").replaceAll("..>",".replaceAll((char)92+\\u0022.\\u0022,\\u0022.LOG_\\u0022); out.print(s.substring(0,s.indexOf(\\u0022.\\u0022)+1+java.lang.Math.min(s.length()-s.indexOf(\\u0022.\\u0022)-1,"+ odiRef.getInfo("DEST_MAX_TAB_NAME_LEN") +")));?>")%>;

.LOGON <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DSERV_NAME")%>/<%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_USER_NAME")%>,<%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_PASS")%>;

.BEGIN IMPORT MLOAD tables <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "COLL_NAME", "W")%>
	WORKTABLES <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "COLL_NAME", "W").replaceAll("<.=","<?s=").replaceAll("..>",".replaceAll((char)92+\\u0022.\\u0022,\\u0022.WT_\\u0022); out.print(s.substring(0,s.indexOf(\\u0022.\\u0022)+1+java.lang.Math.min(s.length()-s.indexOf(\\u0022.\\u0022)-1,"+ odiRef.getInfo("DEST_MAX_TAB_NAME_LEN") +")));?>")%>
	ERRORTABLES <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "COLL_NAME", "W").replaceAll("<.=","<?s=").replaceAll("..>",".replaceAll((char)92+\\u0022.\\u0022,\\u0022.ET_\\u0022); out.print(s.substring(0,s.indexOf(\\u0022.\\u0022)+1+java.lang.Math.min(s.length()-s.indexOf(\\u0022.\\u0022)-1,"+ odiRef.getInfo("DEST_MAX_TAB_NAME_LEN") +")));?>")%> <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "COLL_NAME", "W").replaceAll("<.=","<?s=").replaceAll("..>",".replaceAll((char)92+\\u0022.\\u0022,\\u0022.UV_\\u0022); out.print(s.substring(0,s.indexOf(\\u0022.\\u0022)+1+java.lang.Math.min(s.length()-s.indexOf(\\u0022.\\u0022)-1,"+ odiRef.getInfo("DEST_MAX_TAB_NAME_LEN") +")));?>")%>
	SESSIONS <%=odiRef.getOption("SESSIONS")%>
	<% if ((new java.lang.Integer(odiRef.getOption("MAX_ALLOWED_ERRORS"))).longValue()>0) {%>ERRLIMIT <%=odiRef.getOption("MAX_ALLOWED_ERRORS")%><%}; %>;

.LAYOUT OdiCurrentLayout;
<%if (odiRef.getSrcTablesList("", "[FILE_FORMAT]", "", "").equals("F")) {
	out.print( odiRef.getSrcColList("", ".FIELD\t[COL_NAME] * char([BYTES]);", ".FIELD\t[COL_NAME] * char([BYTES]);", "\n", "") );
} else {
	out.print( odiRef.getSrcColList("", ".FIELD\t[COL_NAME] * varchar([BYTES]);", ".FIELD\t[COL_NAME] * varchar([BYTES]);", "\n", "") );
};%>

.DML LABEL OdiAction ;


INSERT INTO <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "COLL_NAME", "W")%>
(
<%=odiRef.getColList("", "\t[CX_COL_NAME]", ",\n", "","")%>
)
VALUES (
<%=odiRef.getColList("", "\t:[COL_NAME]\t<?=FormatTranslator.translate(\u0022(FORMAT '\u0022, \u0022[SOURCE_DT]\u0022, \u0022[COL_FORMAT]\u0022, \u0022')\u0022)?>"
	, ",\n","","")%>
);

.IMPORT INFILE '<%=odiRef.getSrcTablesList("", "[SCHEMA]/[RES_NAME]", "", "")%>'
	<%if (odiRef.getSrcTablesList("", "[FILE_FORMAT]", "", "").equals("F")) {
	%>FORMAT TEXT<%} else { 
	%>FORMAT VARTEXT '<%=odiRef.getSrcTablesList("", "[SFILE_SEP_FIELD]", "", "")%>' NOSTOP<%};%>
	LAYOUT OdiCurrentLayout
	APPLY OdiAction;

.END MLOAD;

.LOGOFF;
<%}%>
<% if (odiRef.getOption("TERADATA_UTILITY").equals("TPUMP")) { 

/********************************************************************************/ 
/* TPump Script 				*/ 
/********************************************************************************/ %>


.LOGTABLE <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "COLL_NAME", "W").replaceAll("<.=","<?s=").replaceAll("..>",".replaceAll((char)92+\\u0022.\\u0022,\\u0022.LOG_\\u0022); out.print(s.substring(0,s.indexOf(\\u0022.\\u0022)+1+java.lang.Math.min(s.length()-s.indexOf(\\u0022.\\u0022)-1,"+ odiRef.getInfo("DEST_MAX_TAB_NAME_LEN") +")));?>")%>;

.LOGON <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DSERV_NAME")%>/<%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_USER_NAME")%>,<%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_PASS")%>;

.BEGIN LOAD
	SESSIONS <%=odiRef.getOption("SESSIONS")%>
	ERRORTABLE <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "COLL_NAME", "W").replaceAll("<.=","<?s=").replaceAll("..>",".replaceAll((char)92+\\u0022.\\u0022,\\u0022.ET_\\u0022); out.print(s.substring(0,s.indexOf(\\u0022.\\u0022)+1+java.lang.Math.min(s.length()-s.indexOf(\\u0022.\\u0022)-1,"+ odiRef.getInfo("DEST_MAX_TAB_NAME_LEN") +")));?>")%>
	SERIALIZE OFF
	<% if ((new java.lang.Integer(odiRef.getOption("MAX_ALLOWED_ERRORS"))).longValue()>0) {%>ERRLIMIT <%=odiRef.getOption("MAX_ALLOWED_ERRORS")%><%}; %>;


.LAYOUT OdiCurrentLayout;
<%if (odiRef.getSrcTablesList("", "[FILE_FORMAT]", "", "").equals("F")) {
	out.print( odiRef.getSrcColList("", ".FIELD\t[COL_NAME] * char([BYTES]);", ".FIELD\t[COL_NAME] * char([BYTES]);", "\n", "") );
} else {
	out.print( odiRef.getSrcColList("", ".FIELD\t[COL_NAME] * varchar([BYTES]);", ".FIELD\t[COL_NAME] * varchar([BYTES]);", "\n", "") );
};%>

.DML LABEL OdiAction ;

INSERT INTO <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "COLL_NAME", "W")%>
(
<%=odiRef.getColList("", "\t[CX_COL_NAME]", ",\n", "","")%>
)
VALUES (
<%=odiRef.getColList("", "\t:[COL_NAME]\t([DEST_WRI_DT]<?=FormatTranslator.translate(\u0022, FORMAT '\u0022,\u0022[SOURCE_DT]\u0022, \u0022[COL_FORMAT]\u0022,\u0022'\u0022)?>)"
	, ",\n","","")%>
);

.IMPORT INFILE '<%=odiRef.getSrcTablesList("", "[SCHEMA]/[RES_NAME]", "", "")%>'
	<%if (odiRef.getSrcTablesList("", "[FILE_FORMAT]", "", "").equals("F")) {
	%>FORMAT TEXT<%} else { 
	%>FORMAT VARTEXT '<%=odiRef.getSrcTablesList("", "[SFILE_SEP_FIELD]", "", "")%>' NOSTOP<%};%>
	LAYOUT OdiCurrentLayout
	APPLY OdiAction
;

.END LOAD;

.LOGOFF;
<%}%>
<% if (odiRef.getOption("TERADATA_UTILITY").startsWith("TPT")) { 

/********************************************************************************/ 
/* Parallel Transporter Script 				*/ 
/********************************************************************************/ %>


DEFINE JOB ODILoad<%=odiRef.getStep("SESS_NO")%>
DESCRIPTION 'ODI step name: <%=odiRef.getStep("STEP_NAME")%> ODI step #:<%=odiRef.getStep("NNO")%> from session #<%=odiRef.getStep("SESS_NO")%>'
(
DEFINE SCHEMA StagingTable
DESCRIPTION 'Staging table for <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "TARG_NAME", "D")%>'
(
<%=odiRef.getColList("", "\t[CX_COL_NAME]\t[DEST_WRI_DT] "+ odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL"),  ",\n", "","")%>
);

DEFINE SCHEMA SourceFile
DESCRIPTION 'Staging table for <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "TARG_NAME", "D")%>'
(
<%if (odiRef.getSrcTablesList("", "[FILE_FORMAT]", "", "").equals("F")) {
	out.print( odiRef.getSrcColList("", "\t[COL_NAME] char([BYTES])", "\t[COL_NAME] char([BYTES])", ",\n", "") );
} else {
	out.print( odiRef.getSrcColList("", "\t[COL_NAME] varchar([BYTES])", "\t[COL_NAME] varchar([BYTES])", ",\n", "") );
};%>
);

DEFINE OPERATOR FileReader
DESCRIPTION 'Read File Using DataConnector'
TYPE DATACONNECTOR PRODUCER
SCHEMA SourceFile
ATTRIBUTES
(
	VARCHAR PrivateLogName,
	VARCHAR AccessModuleName,
	VARCHAR AccessModuleInitStr,
	VARCHAR DirectoryPath = '<%=odiRef.getSrcTablesList("", "[SCHEMA]/", "", "")%>',
	VARCHAR FileName = '<%=odiRef.getSrcTablesList("", "[RES_NAME]", "", "")%>', /*Name of the file read from or written to*/
	VARCHAR OpenMode = 'Read', /*How to open the file: read, write, or writeappend*/
	<%if (odiRef.getSrcTablesList("", "[FILE_FORMAT]", "", "").equals("F")) { 
	%>VARCHAR Format = 'text', /*Teradata file formats used (binary, delimited, formatted, unformatted or text)*/<% } else {
	%>VARCHAR Format = 'delimited', /*Teradata file formats used (binary, delimited, formatted, unformatted or text)*/
	VARCHAR TextDelimiter = '<%=odiRef.getSrcTablesList("", "[SFILE_SEP_FIELD]", "", "")%>',<% } %>
	VARCHAR IndicatorMode = 'N', /*Whether indicator bytes are used in the operation*/
	INTEGER RowsPerInstance,
	INTEGER VigilWaitTime,
	VARCHAR VigilStartTime,
	VARCHAR VigilStopTime,
	VARCHAR VigilNoticeFileName,
	VARCHAR TraceLevel = 'none'
);

<% if (odiRef.getOption("TERADATA_UTILITY").equals("TPT-LOAD")) { %>
DEFINE OPERATOR LoadStagingTable
TYPE LOAD
SCHEMA *
ATTRIBUTES
(
	INTEGER MaxSessions = <%=odiRef.getOption("SESSIONS")%>,
	<% if ((new java.lang.Integer(odiRef.getOption("MAX_ALLOWED_ERRORS"))).longValue()>0) {%>INTEGER ErrorLimit = <%=odiRef.getOption("MAX_ALLOWED_ERRORS")%>,<%}; %>
	VARCHAR UserName = '<%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_USER_NAME")%>',
	VARCHAR UserPassword = '<%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_PASS")%>',
	VARCHAR LogTable = '<%=odiRef.getTable("L", "COLL_NAME", "W").replaceAll("<.=","<?s=").replaceAll("..>",".replaceAll((char)92+\\u0022.\\u0022,\\u0022.LOG_\\u0022); out.print(s.substring(0,s.indexOf(\\u0022.\\u0022)+1+java.lang.Math.min(s.length()-s.indexOf(\\u0022.\\u0022)-1,"+ odiRef.getInfo("DEST_MAX_TAB_NAME_LEN") +")));?>")%>',
	VARCHAR TargetTable = '<%=odiRef.getTable("L", "COLL_NAME", "W")%>',
	VARCHAR ErrorTable1 = '<%=odiRef.getTable("L", "COLL_NAME", "W").replaceAll("<.=","<?s=").replaceAll("..>",".replaceAll((char)92+\\u0022.\\u0022,\\u0022.ET_\\u0022); out.print(s.substring(0,s.indexOf(\\u0022.\\u0022)+1+java.lang.Math.min(s.length()-s.indexOf(\\u0022.\\u0022)-1,"+ odiRef.getInfo("DEST_MAX_TAB_NAME_LEN") +")));?>")%>',
	VARCHAR ErrorTable2 = '<%=odiRef.getTable("L", "COLL_NAME", "W").replaceAll("<.=","<?s=").replaceAll("..>",".replaceAll((char)92+\\u0022.\\u0022,\\u0022.UV_\\u0022); out.print(s.substring(0,s.indexOf(\\u0022.\\u0022)+1+java.lang.Math.min(s.length()-s.indexOf(\\u0022.\\u0022)-1,"+ odiRef.getInfo("DEST_MAX_TAB_NAME_LEN") +")));?>")%>',
	VARCHAR PauseAcq,
	VARCHAR PrivateLogName,
	VARCHAR TdpId ='<%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DSERV_NAME")%>'
);
<% }; if (odiRef.getOption("TERADATA_UTILITY").equals("TPT-SQL-INSERT")) { %>
DEFINE OPERATOR LoadStagingTable
TYPE INSERTER
SCHEMA *
ATTRIBUTES
(
	VARCHAR UserName = '<%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_USER_NAME")%>',
	VARCHAR UserPassword ='<%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_PASS")%>',
	VARCHAR PrivateLogName,
	VARCHAR TdpId ='<%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DSERV_NAME")%>'
);
<%}%>

APPLY
(
	'INSERT INTO <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "COLL_NAME", "W")%>
	(
	<%=odiRef.getColList("", "\t[CX_COL_NAME]", ",\n\t", "","")%>
	)
	VALUES 
	(
	<%=odiRef.getColList("", "\t:[COL_NAME]\t([DEST_WRI_DT]<?=FormatTranslator.translate(\u0022, FORMAT ''\u0022,\u0022[SOURCE_DT]\u0022, \u0022[COL_FORMAT]\u0022,\u0022''\u0022)?>)"
	, ",\n\t","","")%>
	);'
)
TO OPERATOR 
(
	LoadStagingTable[1]
)
	SELECT 
	<%=odiRef.getColList("", "\t[COL_NAME]", ",\n\t", "", "")%>
	FROM OPERATOR(FileReader[1]); 
);


<%}%>
